statements: SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate, timestamp FROM email_tracking;
SELECT * FROM email_tracking WHERE open_rate > 0.5;
SELECT email_id, click_through_rate FROM email_tracking WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(open_rate), MAX(click_through_rate) FROM email_tracking;
SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_tracking ORDER BY email_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM email_tracking ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT email_id, click_through_rate FROM email_tracking WHERE open_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate, timestamp FROM email_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT email_id, open_rate FROM email_tracking WHERE click_through_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY open_rate ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT email_id, open_rate FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM email_click_through_rates ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT email_id, click_through_rate FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE click_through_rate < 0.2;
SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_open_rates JOIN email_click_through_rates ON email_open_rates.email_id = email_click_through_rates.email_id;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT email_id, open_rate FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_rate DESC;
SELECT email_id, open_rate FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT eor.email_id, eor.open_rate, ectr.click_through_rate FROM email_open_rates AS eor JOIN email_click_through_rates AS ectr ON eor.email_id = ectr.email_id;
SELECT AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_click_through_rate FROM email_open_rates er JOIN email_click_through_rates ctr ON er.email_id = ctr.email_id;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT email_id, open_time, is_open FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_time DESC;
SELECT email_id, open_time, is_open FROM email_open_rates WHERE is_open = TRUE;
SELECT email_id, COUNT(email_id) AS open_count FROM email_open_rates GROUP BY email_id;
SELECT email_id, performance_score FROM email_open_rates JOIN performance_analysis ON email_open_rates.email_id = performance_analysis.email_id;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE is_open = TRUE ORDER BY open_time DESC;
SELECT email_id, open_time FROM email_open_rates WHERE email_id > 100 ORDER BY open_time ASC;
SELECT p.analysis_id, p.performance_score, e.is_open FROM performance_analysis p INNER JOIN email_open_rates e ON p.email_id = e.email_id WHERE p.performance_score > 0.8;
SELECT c.click_id, c.click_time, e.open_time FROM click_through_rates c JOIN email_open_rates e ON c.click_id = e.email_id WHERE c.is_clicked = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(p.performance_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS analysis_count FROM performance_analysis p GROUP BY p.email_id HAVING analysis_count > 2 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_rate DESC;
SELECT email_address, click_through_rate FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_through_rate > 0.2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, email_address, action_timestamp FROM email_logs ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY email_address DESC
SELECT email_address, open_rate FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_rate >= 0.3 ORDER BY open_rate ASC
SELECT email_address, click_through_rate FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_through_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY email_address
SELECT e.campaign_name, e.start_date, COUNT(l.id) as total_actions FROM email_campaigns e LEFT JOIN email_logs l ON e.id = l.campaign_id GROUP BY e.campaign_name, e.start_date
SELECT l.email_address, l.action_type, COUNT(l.id) as total_actions, MAX(l.action_timestamp) as last_action FROM email_logs l GROUP BY l.email_address, l.action_type ORDER BY last_action DESC
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT email_address, opened_at FROM email_recipients WHERE recipient_id = 12345;
SELECT campaign_id, open_rate FROM email_open_rate ORDER BY open_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_opens, total_recipients FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_opens DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, total_opens FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT email_address, opened_at FROM email_recipients WHERE opened_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, total_opens, er.open_rate FROM email_campaigns ec JOIN email_open_rate er ON ec.campaign_id = er.campaign_id;

SELECT ec.campaign_name, ec.total_recipients, er.open_rate, cr.click_through_rate FROM email_campaigns ec JOIN email_open_rate er ON ec.campaign_id = er.campaign_id JOIN email_click_through_rate cr ON ec.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id ORDER BY ec.total_recipients DESC;
